resources_added.title: Session October 29 2025: Header Consistency & Beta Prep
resources_added.description: Comprehensive session fixing critical bugs and achieving 100% sitewide header consistency. Fixed 450+ files including bug widget deployment (231 pages), header icons (214 files), auth persistence (142 files), script paths (33 files), and dropdown UX.

resources_added.title: Unit Depth Analysis: Critical Review & Enrichment Opportunities
resources_added.description: Comprehensive analysis of all 7 units assessing depth, assessment quality, and enrichment opportunities. Rankings: Unit 2 (5/5 excellent), Unit 6 (4.5/5), Unit 7 (4/5), Unit 1 (4/5), Unit 5 (3.5/5), Unit 3 (3/5 needs work), Unit 4 (3/5 critical - missing assessment).

resources_added.title: Header Consistency: 100% Sitewide Achievement
resources_added.description: Complete audit and fix of header consistency across 950 HTML pages. Fixed script path errors (35 lessons + 9 games), replaced 1,845 data-icon attributes with emojis, added auth-ui.js to 142 pages, improved dropdown UX.

resources_added.title: Supabase Content Indexing Plan
resources_added.description: Comprehensive SQL generated to index all 157 teaching resources. Currently 126 indexed, 31 missing. Generated comprehensive-resource-index.sql (72KB, 2375 lines) with auto-extracted metadata.

resources_added.title: Dropdown UX: Trackpad-Friendly Navigation
resources_added.description: CSS improvements to make navigation dropdowns much more forgiving for trackpad users. Increased hide delay from 500ms to 1.2s, removed gap between nav and dropdown, added 20px safe hover zone.

resources_added.title: Ready to Launch: Final Beta Checklist
resources_added.description: Complete checklist for beta launch. All code 100% ready. Manual steps needed: commit changes (33 files), execute Supabase indexing SQL, test on local server. Includes beta invitation email template.
